title: Mini Ep 13: Addressing The Rumors About Our Friendship
itunes:title: Mini Ep 13: Addressing The Rumors About Our Friendship
itunes:subtitle: Hollywood is full of secrets.
description:
We’re baaaa-aaack. And she’s Jaaa-aaack. And I’m Jack’s Moooo-ooom. (In Into the Woods.) Hello friends, old and new! Jackie and I took a break from minis for a bit because, you know hashtag life happens! For those who missed our big idea brainstorming sessions, fear not. Something unhinged comes up right at the end.


PRODUCTS MENTIONED: 


Hotel Lobby Candle: https://rstyle.me/+4uFoDvwuW0cMB1U-gpvl2Q 

Baboon to the Moon: www.baboontothemoon.com 

El Cholo’s Kid: https://www.elcholoskid.com/ (Use Code GEETHANKS for 20% off!)

Old Navy Baby: https://rstyle.me/+qhmhmiAt81d0R_8Nq2W5fQ 

Best Old Navy Jeans: https://rstyle.me/+dDhSJKgfGjyHJubxaxg_kw 

The Snoo: https://fave.co/3HDR9Of 

Dock-a-Tot: https://fave.co/3Bl9HAB 


Want more Jackie and Caroline? Check out our 8-episode show “JUST ONE EPISODE” streaming only on Patreon (the “JUST ONE EPISODE” tier!): https://www.patreon.com/geethanksandfriends 


Gee Thanks! is powered by subscribers like you! To keep all of our Gee Thanks! content free and accessible to all, consider making a monthly donation of $2 to keep us going. 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod and shop all of our recs here: www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 


As always, reach me at Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com, @geethanksjustboughtitpod on Instagram, or leave me a message at 424-245-0736. 



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
